channel.title: Rune-Zone [Hiring]
channel.description:
[center]Hello and welcome to Rune-Zone Isle Development Team! I need 3-4 persons who is gonna help me making my 317 server done then release. [ol][size=18pt]To view the development:[/size] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,456831.msg3343574.html#msg3343574 [b][size=14pt]What I need is:[/size][/b] [list][li]Client Developers [450+Cache] [Fix No Clipping] - 2/0[/li] [li] Forum Developer - 1/0[/li] [li]Coder [Fix dupes] [Fix No Clipping] - 1/0[/li] [/list] Application form:
Name: Position: Experenice: Will you be Dedicated?: MSN/Email:
The Team: Owner of Rune-Zone-Isle [img]http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:3GiDAzJ5GKd0tM:http://i297.photobucket.com/albums/mm232/mintkiller/OwnerCrown.gif&t=1[/img]Encrypted Administrators & Coders of Rune-Zone [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/5ex3id.gif[/img]Encrypted [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/5ex3id.gif[/img]NONE Developer, Testers & Moderators [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/15i973o.gif[/img]NONE [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/15i973o.gif[/img]NONE [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/15i973o.gif[/img]NONE [img]http://www.runescape100.com/guides/images/enter-the-runescape-wilderness.png[/img] Home! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2mfkyee.png[/img] Premium! [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/5djm15.png[/img] Npc Dialogue/Player Teleport! [img]http://i54.tinypic.com/wsr9k6.png[/img] Lunar Spells Tab! [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9762/lunar.png[/img] Vengeance Emote [Just Missing Skull] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/oj2d08.png[/img] ISP Shop/Prices! [img]http://i51.tinypic.com/23abro.png[/img] Level 4 Wild Instantly [Edgeville] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2jaf9fl.png[/img] Those are just a few pictures of what has been done, still lots of things to be done. I hope you enjoyed the development thread and I hope you pray and wish me luck! I will be on the server-coding part. Every people in the team must be on for more than 4 hours a day. [size=12pt][i][b]All developers of client, and server will be payed on the 3rd and 18th of each month.[/b][/i][/size] [/center][/ol]

item.title: Rune-Zone [Hiring]
item.dc:creator: @Encryption Encryption
item.description:
@Encryption wrote:

John459:

The folder name on any packaged source is what tells what’s in it. I do not do anything with private servers, and I hope people haven’t gotten so retarded to give the folders names which have nothing to do with their contents.

There’s some rushed stuff in most server files.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“John459, post:14, topic:360239”][quote author=revengr link=topic=456672.msg3342257#msg3342257 date=1284495084]
I cannot code packaged servers well.
[/quote]

You do know that makes no sense? They are both done in the same language(usually for the shit servers you people apparently love to use), so the only difference in the location of the files, and if that is what makes it hard then please go see a doctor because you are mentally retarded.[/quote]

Lol, its just going through all the folders and searching around is the only thing that bus people.

Read full topic
